name: Color Out of Space
summary_text: A secluded farm is struck by a strange meteorite which has apocalyptic consequences for the family living there and possibly the world.

name: The Wife
summary_text: A wife questions her life choices as she travels to Stockholm to see her husband receive the Nobel Prize for Literature.

name: Death Wish
summary_text: A New York City architect becomes a one-man vigilante squad after his wife is murdered by street punks in which he randomly goes out and kills would-be muggers on the mean streets after dark.

name: Spy Hard
summary_text: Dick Steele, Agent WD-40 is assigned by his Director, to stop the evil General Rancor from destroying the world. WD-40 believed Rancor was dead and he teams up with the hot K.G.B. Agent Veronique Ukrinsky to find Rancor and save the world.

name: Tesis
summary_text: While doing a thesis about violence, Ángela finds a snuff video where a girl is tortured until death. Soon she discovers that the girl was a former student in her faculty...

name: Chopper
summary_text: Chopper tells the intense story of Mark "Chopper" Read, a legendary criminal who wrote his autobiography while serving a jail sentence in prison. His book, "From the Inside", upon which the film is based, was a best-seller.

name: High and Low
summary_text: An executive of a shoe company becomes a victim of extortion when his chauffeur's son is kidnapped and held for ransom.

name: Tales from Earthsea
summary_text: In a mythical land, a man and a young boy investigate a series of unusual occurrences.

name: The Human Centipede II (Full Sequence)
summary_text: Inspired by the fictional Dr. Heiter, disturbed loner Martin dreams of creating a 12-person centipede and sets out to realize his sick fantasy.

name: The Final Girls
summary_text: A young woman grieving the loss of her mother, a famous scream queen from the 1980s, finds herself pulled into the world of her mom's most famous movie. Reunited, the women must fight off the film's maniacal killer.

name: The Paperboy
summary_text: A reporter returns to his Florida hometown to investigate a case involving a death row inmate.

name: Hamlet
summary_text: Hamlet, Prince of Denmark, returns home to find his father murdered and his mother remarrying the murderer, his uncle. Meanwhile, war is brewing.

name: Dressed to Kill
summary_text: A mysterious blonde woman kills one of a psychiatrist's patients, and then goes after the high-class call girl who witnessed the murder.

name: Confessions
summary_text: A psychological thriller of a grieving mother turned cold-blooded avenger with a twisty master plan to pay back those who were responsible for her daughter's death.

name: The Lizzie McGuire Movie
summary_text: Lizzie McGuire has graduated from middle school and takes a trip to Rome, Italy with her class. And what was supposed to be only a normal trip, becomes a teenager's dream come true.

name: Message in a Bottle
summary_text: A woman discovers a tragic love letter in a bottle on a beach, and is determined to track down its author.

name: The Hottie & the Nottie
summary_text: A woman agrees to go on a date with a man only if he finds a suitor for her unattractive best friend.

name: No Way Out
summary_text: A coverup and witchhunt occur after a politician accidentally kills his mistress.

name: Bitter Moon
summary_text: After hearing stories of her, a passenger on a cruise ship develops an irresistible infatuation with an eccentric paraplegic's wife.

name: Mean Machine
summary_text: A football star jailed for assault leads a group of inmates in a match against prison guards.

name: Cedar Rapids
summary_text: Tim Lippe has no idea what he's in for when he's sent to Cedar Rapids, Iowa to represent his company at an annual insurance convention, where he soon finds himself under the "guidance" of three convention veterans.

name: The 33
summary_text: Based on the real-life event, when a gold and copper mine collapses, it traps 33 miners underground for 69 days.

name: Book of Shadows: Blair Witch 2
summary_text: A group of tourists arrives in Burkittsville, Maryland after seeing The Blair Witch Project (1999) to explore the mythology and phenomenon, only to come face to face with their own neuroses and possibly the witch herself.

name: The Tale of Despereaux
summary_text: An unusually brave mouse helps to restore happiness to a forlorn kingdom after making friends with a gentleman rat.

name: The Savages
summary_text: A sister and brother face the realities of familial responsibility as they begin to care for their ailing father.

name: Killing Season
summary_text: Two veterans of the Bosnian War, one American, one Serbian, find their unlikely friendship tested when one of them reveals their true intentions.

name: Man of Tai Chi
summary_text: A young martial artist's unparalleled Tai Chi skills land him in a highly lucrative underworld fight club.

name: Hollywood Homicide
summary_text: Two LAPD detectives who moonlight in other fields investigate the murder of an up-and-coming rap group.

name: House of the Dead
summary_text: A group of college students travels to a mysterious island to attend a rave, which is soon taken over by bloodthirsty zombies.

name: Muriel's Wedding
summary_text: A young social outcast in Australia steals money from her parents to finance a vacation where she hopes to find happiness, and perhaps love.

name: The Choice
summary_text: Travis and Gabby first meet as neighbors in a small coastal town and wind up in a relationship that is tested by life's most defining events.

name: Anna and the King
summary_text: The story of the romance between the King of Siam and widowed British schoolteacher, Anna Leonowens, during the 1860s.

name: Brewster's Millions
summary_text: A minor league baseball player has to spend $30 million in thirty days, in order to inherit $300 million. However, he's not allowed to own any assets, destroy the money, gift it, give it to charity or tell anyone about the deal.

name: Evil
summary_text: A teenage boy expelled from school for fighting arrives at a boarding school where the systematic bullying of younger students is encouraged as a means to maintain discipline, and decides to fight back.

name: Bachelor Party
summary_text: A soon-to-be-married man's friends throw him the ultimate bachelor party.

name: Spider
summary_text: A mentally disturbed man takes residence in a halfway house. His mind gradually slips back into the realm created by his illness, where he replays a key part of his childhood.

name: Mr. Holland's Opus
summary_text: A frustrated composer finds fulfillment as a high school music teacher.

name: McFarland, USA
summary_text: Jim White moves his family after losing his last job as a football coach, and at his new school he turns seven disappointing students into one of the best cross-country teams in the region.

name: Hang 'Em High
summary_text: When an innocent man barely survives a lynching, he returns as a lawman determined to bring the vigilantes to justice.

name: The Cave
summary_text: Blood-thirsty creatures await a pack of divers who become trapped in an underwater cave network.

name: Bullets Over Broadway
summary_text: In New York in 1928, a struggling playwright is forced to cast a mobster's talentless girlfriend in his latest drama in order to get it produced.

name: ARQ
summary_text: Trapped in a lab and stuck in a time loop, a disoriented couple fends off masked raiders while harboring a new energy source that could save humanity.

name: Kill Your Darlings
summary_text: A murder in 1944 draws together the great poets of the beat generation: Allen Ginsberg, Jack Kerouac, and William Burroughs.

name: Sierra Burgess Is a Loser
summary_text: A case of mistaken identity results in unexpected romance when the most popular girl in high school and the biggest loser must come together to win over their crushes.

name: I See You
summary_text: Strange occurrences plague a small town detective and his family as he investigates the disappearance of a young boy.

name: The Cold Light of Day
summary_text: After his family is kidnapped during their sailing trip in Spain, a young Wall Street trader is confronted by the people responsible: intelligence agents looking to recover a mysterious briefcase.

name: The Amityville Horror
summary_text: Newlyweds and their three kids move into a large house where a mass murder was committed. They start to experience strange, inexplicable manifestations which have strong effects on everyone living or visiting the house.

name: The Way Back
summary_text: Jack Cunningham was a high school basketball phenom who walked away from the game, forfeiting his future. Years later, when he reluctantly accepts a coaching job at his alma mater, he may get one last shot at redemption.

name: I Give It a Year
summary_text: Newlywed couple Nat and Josh are deliriously happy despite their differences, though friends and family aren't convinced that they can last. With their first anniversary approaching and attractive alternatives in the mix, can they last?

name: Pusher
summary_text: A drug pusher grows increasingly desperate after a botched deal leaves him with a large debt to a ruthless drug lord.

name: The Endless
summary_text: As kids, they escaped a UFO death cult. Now, two adult brothers seek answers after an old videotape surfaces and brings them back to where they began.

name: The Crucible
summary_text: A Salem resident attempts to frame her ex-lover's wife for being a witch in the middle of the 1692 witchcraft trials.

name: Everyone Says I Love You
summary_text: A New York girl sets her father up with a beautiful woman in a troubled marriage while her stepsister gets engaged.

name: Fantasia 2000
summary_text: An update of the original film with new interpretations of great works of classical music.

name: Defendor
summary_text: Arthur Poppington, a regular man who adopts a superhero persona, known as "Defendor", combs the city streets at night, in search of his archenemy, Captain Industry.

name: The Divide
summary_text: Survivors of a nuclear attack are grouped together for days in the basement of their apartment building, where fear and dwindling supplies wear away at their dynamic.

name: Detroit Rock City
summary_text: In 1978, four rebellious teenagers try to scam their way into a KISS concert.

name: The Report
summary_text: Idealistic Senate staffer Daniel J. Jones, tasked by his boss to lead an investigation into the CIA's post 9/11 Detention and Interrogation Program, uncovers shocking secrets.

name: The Last Days on Mars
summary_text: A group of astronaut explorers succumb one by one to a mysterious and terrifying force while collecting specimens on Mars.

name: Cake
summary_text: The acerbic, hilarious Claire Bennett becomes fascinated by the suicide of a woman in her chronic pain support group. As she uncovers the details of Nina's suicide and develops a poignant relationship with Nina's husband, she also grapples with her own, very raw personal tragedy.

name: Meet the Blacks
summary_text: As Carl Black gets the opportunity to move his family out of Chicago in hope of a better life, their arrival in Beverly Hills is timed with that city's annual purge, where all crime is legal for twelve hours.

name: The Guilt Trip
summary_text: As inventor Andy Brewster is about to embark on the road trip of a lifetime, a quick stop at his mom's house turns into an unexpected cross-country voyage with her along for the ride.

name: Searching for Bobby Fischer
summary_text: A prepubescent chess prodigy refuses to harden himself in order to become a champion like the famous but unlikable Bobby Fischer.

name: Uptown Girls
summary_text: A grown-up woman, who kept her childish instincts and behavior, starts working as a nanny of a 8-year-old girl, who actually acts like an adult. But in the end everything turns to its right places.

name: The Hidden Fortress
summary_text: Lured by gold, two greedy peasants unknowingly escort a princess and her general across enemy lines.

name: The Legend of Tomiris
summary_text: This is the story of the life of the great queen of of the steppe - legendary Tomiris. She is destined to become a skillful warrior, survive the loss of close people and unite the Scythian/Saka tribes under her authority.

name: Raising Helen
summary_text: After her sister and brother-in-law die in a car accident, a young woman becomes the guardian of their three children.

name: Chhichhore
summary_text: A tragic incident forces Anirudh, a middle-aged man, to take a trip down memory lane and reminisce his college days along with his friends, who were labelled as losers.

name: The Cook, the Thief, His Wife & Her Lover
summary_text: At Le Hollandais gourmet restaurant, every night is filled with opulence, decadence and gluttony. But when the cook, a thief, his wife and her lover all come together, they unleash a shocking torrent of sex, food, murder and revenge.

name: Hair
summary_text: Claude Bukowski leaves the family ranch in Oklahoma for New York where he is rapidly embraced into the hippie group of youngsters led by Berger, yet he's already been drafted. He soon falls in love with Sheila Franklin, a rich girl but still a rebel inside.

name: The Quiet Man
summary_text: A retired American boxer returns to the village of his birth in Ireland, where he falls for a spirited redhead whose brother is contemptuous of their union.

name: Bulletproof
summary_text: Two criminals, Keats and Moses, end their friendship, when Keats turns out to be an undercover cop. Many years later, the two are forced to work together when Keats is assigned to protect Moses as a witness.

name: Mickey Blue Eyes
summary_text: An English auctioneer proposes to the daughter of a Mafia kingpin, only to realize that certain "favors" would be asked of him.

name: Maniac
summary_text: As he helps a young artist with her upcoming exhibition, the owner of a mannequin shop's deadly, suppressed desires come to the surface.

name: The Protector
summary_text: A young fighter named Kham must go to Australia to retrieve his stolen elephant. With the help of a Thai-born Australian detective, Kham must take on all comers, including a gang led by an evil woman and her two deadly bodyguards.

name: Halloween 5: The Revenge of Michael Myers
summary_text: One year after the events of Halloween 4: The Return of Michael Myers (1988), the Shape returns to Haddonfield once again in an attempt to kill his now-mute niece.

name: Oliver!
summary_text: After being sold to a mortician, young orphan Oliver Twist runs away and meets a group of boys trained to be pickpockets by an elderly mentor.

name: Naked
summary_text: Parallel tales of two sexually obsessed men, one hurting and annoying women physically and mentally, one wandering around the city talking to strangers and experiencing dimensions of life.

name: Sex and Lucía
summary_text: Various lives converge on an isolated island, all connected by an author whose novel has become inextricably entwined with his own life.

name: Big Fat Liar
summary_text: Fourteen-year-old Jason Shepherd has a reputation for stretching the truth. So, when big-time Hollywood producer Marty Wolf steals his class paper and turns it into a smash hit movie, no one believes Jason's latest tall tale.

name: Nine Months
summary_text: When he finds out his longtime girlfriend is pregnant, a commitment-phobe realizes he might have to change his lifestyle for better or much, much worse.

name: Keith
summary_text: Natalie, head of her curriculum activities in high school and riding on a tennis scholarship for college, gets Keith as her Chemistry lab partner. As Natalie can be uptight, Keith proves to be the opposite, even while hiding a secret.

name: Me and You and Everyone We Know
summary_text: A lonely shoe salesman and an eccentric performance artist struggle to connect in this unique take on contemporary life.

name: Nowhere Boy
summary_text: A chronicle of John Lennon's first years, focused mainly in his adolescence and his relationship with his stern aunt Mimi, who raised him, and his absentee mother Julia, who re-entered his life at a crucial moment in his young life.

name: The Ringer
summary_text: A young guy's only option to erase a really bad debt is to rig the Special Olympics by posing as a contestant.

name: The Haunting
summary_text: Hill House has stood for about 90 years and appears haunted: its inhabitants have always met strange, tragic ends. Now Dr. John Markway has assembled a team of people who he thinks will prove whether or not the house is haunted.

name: Race
summary_text: Jesse Owens' quest to become the greatest track and field athlete in history thrusts him onto the world stage of the 1936 Olympics, where he faces off against Adolf Hitler's vision of Aryan supremacy.

name: Paranoia
summary_text: An entry-level employee at a powerful corporation finds himself occupying a corner office, but at a dangerous price: he must spy on his boss's old mentor to secure for him a multi-billion dollar advantage.

name: The Merchant of Venice
summary_text: In 16th century Venice, when a merchant must default on a large loan from an abused Jewish moneylender for a friend with romantic ambitions, the bitterly vengeful creditor demands a gruesome payment instead.

name: Ayla: The Daughter of War
summary_text: In 1950, amid-st the ravages of the Korean War, Sergeant Süleyman stumbles upon a half-frozen little girl, with no parents and no help in sight. Frantic, scared and on the verge of death, ...                See full summary »

name: The Fog
summary_text: A thick mist full of vengeful spirits haunts a prosperous island town off the coast of Oregon, as its inhabitants try to learn their town's dark secret in order to stop it.

name: 102 Dalmatians
summary_text: Cruella DeVil gets out of prison and goes after the puppies once more.

name: Smallfoot
summary_text: A Yeti is convinced that the elusive creatures known as "humans" really do exist.

name: Bringing Down the House
summary_text: When a lonely guy meets a woman on the internet who happens to be in prison, she breaks out to get him to prove her innocence, and proceeds to wreak havoc on his middle-class life.

name: Curse of Chucky
summary_text: After her mother's mysterious death, Nica begins to suspect that the talking, red-haired doll her visiting niece has been playing with may be the key to recent bloodshed and chaos.

name: Mr. Woodcock
summary_text: Taken aback by his mother's wedding announcement, a young man returns home in an effort to stop her from marrying his old high school gym teacher, a man who made middle school hell for generations of students.

name: Stranger Than Paradise
summary_text: A New Yorker's life is thrown into a tailspin when his younger cousin surprise-visits him, starting a strange, unpredictable adventure.

name: Father of the Bride Part II
summary_text: George Banks must deal not only with the pregnancy of his daughter, but also with the unexpected pregnancy of his wife.

name: The Libertine
summary_text: The story of John Wilmot, a.k.a. the Earl of Rochester, a 17th century poet who famously drank and debauched his way to an early grave, only to earn posthumous critical acclaim for his life's work.

name: Operation Finale
summary_text: A team of secret agents set out to track down the Nazi officer who masterminded the Holocaust.

name: Black Sea
summary_text: In order to make good with his former employers, a submarine captain takes a job with a shadowy backer to search the depths of the Black Sea for a submarine rumored to be loaded with gold.

name: Overboard
summary_text: After a spoiled, wealthy yacht owner is thrown overboard and loses his memory, a mistreated employee convinces him that he is her working-class husband.

name: Code 8
summary_text: A super-powered construction worker falls in with a group of criminals in order to raise the funds to help his ill mother.

name: Black Christmas
summary_text: During their Christmas break, a group of sorority girls are stalked by a stranger.

name: Birth
summary_text: A young boy attempts to convince a woman that he is her dead husband reborn.

name: Ninja Scroll
summary_text: A vagabond swordsman is aided by a beautiful ninja girl and a crafty spy in confronting a demonic clan of killers - with a ghost from his past as their leader - who are bent on overthrowing the Tokugawa Shogunate.

name: Passengers
summary_text: A grief counselor working with a group of plane-crash survivors finds herself at the root of a mystery when her clients begin to disappear.

name: Bully
summary_text: A pack of naïve teenagers conspire to murder a mutual friend, whose aggressive demeanor has proved too much.

name: The Devil Inside
summary_text: In Italy, a woman becomes involved in a series of unauthorized exorcisms during her mission to discover what happened to her mother, who allegedly murdered three people during her own exorcism.

name: Orgazmo
summary_text: Naive young Mormon Joe Young is recruited to act in porn movies.

name: Murder by Death
summary_text: Five famous literary detective characters and their sidekicks are invited to a bizarre mansion to solve an even stranger mystery.

name: Summer of 84
summary_text: After suspecting that their police officer neighbor is a serial killer, a group of teenage friends spend their summer spying on him and gathering evidence, but as they get closer to discovering the truth, things get dangerous.

name: Joe Versus the Volcano
summary_text: When a hypochondriac learns that he is dying, he accepts an offer to throw himself in a volcano at a tropical island, and along the way there, learns to truly live.

name: Manos: The Hands of Fate
summary_text: A family gets lost on the road and stumbles upon a hidden, underground, devil-worshiping cult led by the fearsome Master and his servant Torgo.

name: Girls Trip
summary_text: When four lifelong friends travel to New Orleans for the annual Essence Festival, sisterhoods are rekindled, wild sides are rediscovered, and there's enough dancing, drinking, brawling and romancing to make the Big Easy blush.

name: Kind Hearts and Coronets
summary_text: A distant poor relative of the Duke D'Ascoyne plots to inherit the title by murdering the eight other heirs who stand ahead of him in the line of succession.

name: The Lodge
summary_text: A soon-to-be stepmom is snowed in with her fiancé's two children at a remote holiday village. Just as relations begin to thaw between the trio, some strange and frightening events take place.

name: Paul Blart: Mall Cop 2
summary_text: After six years of keeping our malls safe, Paul Blart has earned a well-deserved vacation. He heads to Las Vegas with his teenage daughter before she heads off to college. But safety never takes a holiday and when duty calls, Blart answers.

name: Under the Silver Lake
summary_text: Sam, a disenchanted young man, finds a mysterious woman swimming in his apartment's pool one night. The next morning, she disappears. Sam sets off across LA to find her, and along the way he uncovers a conspiracy far more bizarre.

name: Drishyam
summary_text: A man goes to extreme lengths to save his family from punishment after the family commits an accidental crime.

name: Hit and Run
summary_text: Former getaway driver Charles Bronson jeopardizes his Witness Protection Plan identity in order to help his girlfriend get to Los Angeles. The feds and Charles' former gang chase them on the road.

name: The Invisible
summary_text: A teenager is left invisible to the living after an attack.

name: Race 3
summary_text: Relationships and loyalties of a criminal family planning its next big heist are tested when some shocking revelations strike them.

name: Rubber
summary_text: A homicidal car tire, discovering it has destructive psionic power, sets its sights on a desert town once a mysterious woman becomes its obsession.

name: White Christmas
summary_text: A successful song-and-dance team become romantically involved with a sister act and team up to save the failing Vermont inn of their former commanding general.

name: Don
summary_text: Vijay is recruited by a police officer to masquerade as his lookalike Don, the leader of an international gang of smugglers. Things go wrong when the officer is killed and Vijay is left to fend for himself.

name: Bedknobs and Broomsticks
summary_text: An apprentice witch, three kids and a cynical magician conman search for the missing component to a magic spell to be used in the defense of Britain in World War II.

name: Tolkien
summary_text: The formative years of the orphaned author J.R.R. Tolkien as he finds friendship, love and artistic inspiration among a group of fellow outcasts at school.

name: Kidnap
summary_text: A mother stops at nothing to recover her kidnapped son.

name: Slap Shot
summary_text: A failing ice hockey team finds success with outrageously violent hockey goonery.

name: Giant
summary_text: Sprawling epic covering the life of a Texas cattle rancher and his family and associates.

name: The Butterfly Effect 2
summary_text: Nick Larson discovers a supernatural way to alter his life and travel back in time to key moments in his life by looking at photographs.

name: Annie
summary_text: A foster kid, who lives with her mean foster mom, sees her life change when business tycoon and New York City mayoral candidate Will Stacks makes a thinly-veiled campaign move and takes her in.

name: The Seven Year Itch
summary_text: When his family goes away for the summer, a hitherto faithful husband with an overactive imagination is tempted by a beautiful neighbbor.

name: Repo Man
summary_text: A young punk recruited by a car repossession agency finds himself in pursuit of a Chevrolet Malibu that is wanted for a $20,000 bounty - and has something otherworldly stashed in its trunk.

name: Roman J. Israel, Esq.
summary_text: Roman J. Israel, Esq., a driven, idealistic defense attorney, finds himself in a tumultuous series of events that lead to a crisis and the necessity for extreme action.

name: Friday the 13th: A New Beginning
summary_text: Still haunted by his past, Tommy Jarvis - who, as a child, killed Jason Voorhees - wonders if the serial killer is connected to a series of brutal murders occurring in and around the secluded halfway house where he now lives.

name: The Wave
summary_text: Although anticipated, no one is really ready when the mountain pass above the scenic, narrow Norwegian fjord Geiranger collapses and creates an 85-meter high violent tsunami. A geologist is one of those caught in the middle of it.

name: Life of the Party
summary_text: After her husband abruptly asks for a divorce, a middle-aged mother returns to college in order to complete her degree.

name: The Vanishing
summary_text: Rex and Saskia, a young couple in love, are on vacation. They stop at a busy service station and Saskia is abducted. After three years and no sign of Saskia, Rex begins receiving letters from the abductor.

name: A Life Less Ordinary
summary_text: Upon being fired, a desperate guy kidnaps a daughter of his former boss. Two angels are sent to Earth to check if love is possible in this case.

name: Near Dark
summary_text: A small-town farmer's son reluctantly joins a traveling group of vampires after he is bitten by a beautiful drifter.

name: Happy New Year
summary_text: A gang of amateur dancers takes part in a dancing competition to avenge their personal vendetta.

name: The Last Legion
summary_text: As the Roman empire crumbles, young Romulus Augustus flees the city and embarks on a perilous voyage to Britain to track down a legion of supporters.

name: Monster Hunter
summary_text: When Lt. Artemis and her loyal soldiers are transported to a new world, they engage in a desperate battle for survival against enormous enemies with incredible powers. Feature film based on the video game by Capcom.

name: So I Married an Axe Murderer
summary_text: A San Francisco poet who fears commitment suspects his girlfriend may have a knack for killing off her significant others.

name: Cold in July
summary_text: When a protective father meets a murderous ex-con, both need to deviate from the path they are on as they soon find themselves entangled in a downwards spiral of lies and violence while having to confront their own inner psyche.

name: Prom Night
summary_text: Donna's senior prom is supposed to be the best night of her life, though a sadistic killer from her past has different plans for her and her friends.

name: Bandidas
summary_text: In turn-of-the-century Mexico, two very different women become a bank-robbing duo in an effort to combat a ruthless enforcer terrorizing their town.

name: Dara of Jasenovac
summary_text: Follows the story of a young girl named Dara who is sent to a concentration camp in Croatia during World War 2.

name: BloodRayne
summary_text: In the eighteenth century, a vampire escapes from the freak show, in which she once participated, and teams up with a group of vampire slayers to kill the man who raped her mother.

name: Friday the 13th Part VIII: Jason Takes Manhattan
summary_text: A boatful of graduating high school students headed to Manhattan accidentally pull Jason Voorhees along for the ride.

name: Bananas
summary_text: When a bumbling New Yorker is dumped by his activist girlfriend, he travels to a tiny Latin American nation and becomes involved in its latest rebellion.

name: Picnic at Hanging Rock
summary_text: During a rural summer picnic, a few students and a teacher from an Australian girls' school vanish without a trace. Their absence frustrates and haunts the people left behind.

name: Outside the Wire
summary_text: In the near future, a drone pilot sent into a war zone finds himself paired with a top-secret android officer on a mission to stop a nuclear attack.

name: Bad Education
summary_text: The beloved superintendent of New York's Roslyn school district and his staff, friends and relatives become the prime suspects in the unfolding of the single largest public school embezzlement scandal in American history.

name: Evita
summary_text: The hit musical based on the life of Eva Perón (Evita Duarte), a B-picture Argentinian actress who eventually became the wife of Argentinian president Juan Domingo Perón, and the most beloved and hated woman in Argentina.

name: Private Parts
summary_text: The autobiographical story of Howard Stern, the radio rebel who is now also a TV personality, an author and a movie star.

name: The Trouble with Harry
summary_text: The trouble with Harry is that he is dead and, while no one really minds, everyone feels responsible. After Harry's body is found in the woods, several locals must determine not only how and why he was killed but what to do with the body.

name: La Grande Illusion
summary_text: During WWI, two French soldiers are captured and imprisoned in a German P.O.W. camp. Several escape attempts follow until they are eventually sent to a seemingly inescapable fortress.

name: The Unbearable Lightness of Being
summary_text: Central Europe, 1968: A Czech doctor with an active sex life meets a woman who wants monogamy, and then the Soviet invasion further disrupts their lives.

name: When Marnie Was There
summary_text: Due to 12 y.o. Anna's asthma, she's sent to stay with relatives of her guardian in the Japanese countryside. She likes to be alone, sketching. She befriends Marnie. Who is the mysterious, blonde Marnie.

name: The Tournament
summary_text: A tournament is watched by dozens of wealthy men betting on which one of the 30 assassins will survive the next 24 hours "kill or die" and claim the USD10,000,000 prize. It takes place in an English town with plenty of CCTVs.

name: The Lawnmower Man
summary_text: A simple man is turned into a genius through the application of computer science.

name: Vizontele
summary_text: Lives of residents in a small Anatolian village change when television is introduced to them

name: The Class
summary_text: Teacher and novelist François Bégaudeau plays a version of himself as he negotiates a year with his racially mixed students from a tough Parisian neighborhood.

name: 13 Sins
summary_text: A cryptic phone call sets off a dangerous game of risks for Elliot, a down-on-his-luck salesman. The game promises increasing rewards for completing 13 tasks, each more sinister than the last.

name: Femme Fatale
summary_text: A woman tries to straighten out her life, even as her past as a con-woman comes back to haunt her.

name: Watership Down
summary_text: Hoping to escape destruction by human developers and save their community, a colony of rabbits, led by Hazel and Fiver, seek out a safe place to set up a new warren.

name: Il Postino
summary_text: A simple Italian postman learns to love poetry while delivering mail to a famous poet, and then uses this to woo local beauty Beatrice.

name: The Normal Heart
summary_text: A gay activist attempts to raise H.I.V. and A.I.D.S. awareness during the early 1980s.

name: Maria Full of Grace
summary_text: A pregnant Colombian teenager becomes a drug mule to make some desperately needed money for her family.

name: The Messenger
summary_text: An American soldier struggles with an ethical dilemma when he becomes involved with a widow of a fallen officer.

name: Everything, Everything
summary_text: A teenager who's spent her whole life confined to her home falls for the boy next door.

name: The Andromeda Strain
summary_text: A team of top scientists work feverishly in a secret, state-of-the-art laboratory to discover what has killed the citizens of a small town and learn how this deadly contagion can be stopped.

name: Five Easy Pieces
summary_text: A dropout from upper-class America picks up work along the way on oil rigs when his life isn't spent in a squalid succession of bars, motels, and other points of interest.

name: The Perfect Date
summary_text: To save up for college, Brooks Rattigan creates an app where anyone can pay him to play the perfect stand-in boyfriend for any occasion.

name: Velvet Goldmine
summary_text: In 1984, British journalist Arthur Stuart investigates the career of 1970s glam superstar Brian Slade, who was heavily influenced in his early years by hard-living and rebellious American singer Curt Wild.

name: Hold the Dark
summary_text: After the deaths of three children suspected to be killed by wolves, writer Russell Core is hired by the mother of a missing six-year-old boy to track down and locate her son in the Alaskan wilderness.

name: The Lost Weekend
summary_text: The desperate life of a chronic alcoholic is followed through a four-day drinking bout.

name: The Adventures of Sharkboy and Lavagirl 3-D
summary_text: A young boy is recruited by his imaginary friends Sharkboy and Lavagirl to help save their planet.

name: Throw Momma from the Train
summary_text: A bitter ex-husband wants his former spouse dead. A put-upon momma's boy wants his mother dead. Who will pull it off?

name: The Glass House
summary_text: An orphaned teenager is taken in by a Malibu couple but discovers they aren't the caring friends they seemed to be.

name: English Vinglish
summary_text: A quiet, sweet tempered housewife endures small slights from her well-educated husband and daughter every day because of her inability to speak and understand English.

name: Killer Klowns from Outer Space
summary_text: Aliens who look like clowns come from outer space and terrorize a small town.

name: The New Guy
summary_text: A high school senior branded uncool in the ninth grade gets himself expelled so he changes his image to cool kid at the town's other high school.

name: Deep Rising
summary_text: A group of heavily armed hijackers board a luxury ocean liner in the South Pacific Ocean to loot it, only to do battle with a series of large-sized, tentacled, man-eating sea creatures who had already invaded the ship.

name: The Illusionist
summary_text: A French illusionist finds himself out of work and travels to Scotland, where he meets a young woman. Their ensuing adventure changes both their lives forever.

name: The Santa Clause 3: The Escape Clause
summary_text: Santa, a.k.a. Scott Calvin, is faced with double-duty: how to keep his new family happy and how to stop Jack Frost from taking over Christmas.

name: Hillbilly Elegy
summary_text: An urgent phone call pulls a Yale Law student back to his Ohio hometown, where he reflects on three generations of family history and his own future.

name: Stan & Ollie
summary_text: Laurel and Hardy, the world's most famous comedy duo, attempt to reignite their film careers as they embark on what becomes their swan song - a grueling theatre tour of post-war Britain.

name: Splinter
summary_text: Trapped in an isolated gas station by a voracious Splinter parasite that transforms its still-living victims into deadly hosts, a young couple and an escaped convict must find a way to work together to survive this primal terror.

name: Looney Tunes: Back in Action
summary_text: The Looney Tunes search for a man's missing father and the mythical Blue Monkey diamond.

name: Caligula
summary_text: Details the graphic and shocking but undeniably tragic story of Rome's most infamous Caesar, Gaius Germanicus Caligula.

name: Cyrus
summary_text: John and Molly, a divorced middle aged man and a single mother meet at a friends party and start up a small relationship, all John has to do now is meet Molly's son... Cyrus

name: Red Tails
summary_text: A crew of African American pilots in the Tuskegee training program, having faced segregation while kept mostly on the ground during World War II, are called into duty under the guidance of Col. A.J. Bullard.

name: Arthur and the Invisibles
summary_text: Ten-year-old Arthur, in a bid to save his grandfather's house from being demolished, goes looking for some much-fabled hidden treasure in the land of the Minimoys, tiny people living in harmony with nature.

name: Heist
summary_text: A career jewel thief finds himself at tense odds with his longtime partner, a crime boss who sends his nephew to keep watch.

name: Sanjuro
summary_text: A crafty samurai helps a young man and his fellow clansmen trying to save his uncle, who has been framed and imprisoned by a corrupt superintendent.

name: Boy Erased
summary_text: The son of a Baptist preacher unwillingly participates in a church-supported gay conversion program after being forcibly outed to his parents.

name: Astro Boy
summary_text: When an android replica of a boy is rejected by his aggrieved creator, he goes off to find his own identity in an adventure that would make him the greatest hero of his time.

name: The Good the Bad the Weird
summary_text: The story of two outlaws and a bounty hunter in 1940s Manchuria and their rivalry to possess a treasure map while being pursued by the Japanese army and Chinese bandits.

name: 24 Hour Party People
summary_text: In 1976, Tony Wilson sets up Factory Records and brings Manchester's music to the world.

name: The Siege of Jadotville
summary_text: Irish Commandant Pat Quinlan leads a stand off with troops against French and Belgian Mercenaries in the Congo during the early 1960s.

name: Exorcist: The Beginning
summary_text: Years before Father Lankester Merrin helped save Regan MacNeil's soul, he first encounters the demon Pazuzu in East Africa. This is the tale of Father Merrin's initial battle with Pazuzu and the rediscovery of his faith.

name: Death to 2020
summary_text: Take a look back at the mad glory of the year 2020 in this comedic retrospective.

name: Doc Hollywood
summary_text: A young doctor on his way across the country to a job interview crashes his car in a small town and is sentenced to work for several days at the town hospital.

name: I Love You, Beth Cooper
summary_text: A nerdy valedictorian proclaims his love for Beth Cooper--the hottest, most popular girl in school--during his graduation speech. That very night, she shows up at his door offering to show him the best night of his life.

name: Can't Buy Me Love
summary_text: An outcast secretly pays the most popular girl in school one thousand dollars to pretend to be his girlfriend for a month.

name: Nim's Island
summary_text: A young girl inhabits an isolated island with her scientist father and communicates with a reclusive author of the novel she's reading.

name: The Wrong Missy
summary_text: Tim thinks he's invited the woman of his dreams on a work retreat to Hawaii, realizing too late he mistakenly texted someone from a nightmare blind date.

name: Shattered Glass
summary_text: The story of a young journalist who fell from grace when it was discovered he fabricated over half of his articles from the publication The New Republic magazine.

name: Jack Frost
summary_text: A father who can't keep his promises dies in a car accident. One year later, he returns as a snowman who has the final chance to put things right with his son before he is gone forever.

name: Paan Singh Tomar
summary_text: The story of Paan Singh Tomar, an Indian athlete and seven-time national steeplechase champion who becomes one of the most feared dacoits in Chambal Valley after his retirement.

name: Adam
summary_text: Adam, a lonely man with Asperger's Syndrome, develops a relationship with his upstairs neighbor, Beth.

name: The Code
summary_text: A veteran thief recruits a younger crook to help him pull off one final job in order to repay his debt to the Russian mob.

name: Arif V 216
summary_text: After 8 years, Arif's old friend 216 from planet GORA pays a visit to Earth.Together they go on a quest where they'll be visiting 60's.

name: The Missing
summary_text: In 1885 New Mexico, a frontier medicine woman forms an uneasy alliance with her estranged father when her daughter is kidnapped by an Apache brujo.

name: The Cannonball Run
summary_text: A wide variety of eccentric competitors participate in a wild and illegal cross-country road race. However, the eccentric entrants will do anything to win the road race, including low-down, dirty tricks.

name: Antwone Fisher
summary_text: Antwone Fisher, a young navy man, is forced to see a psychiatrist after a violent outburst against a fellow crewman. During the course of treatment a painful past is revealed and a new hope begins.

name: Black
summary_text: The cathartic tale of a young woman who can't see, hear or talk and the teacher who brings a ray of light into her dark world.

name: Twilight Zone: The Movie
summary_text: Four horror and science fiction segments, directed by four famous directors, each of them being a new version of a classic story from Rod Serling's landmark television series.

name: Undercover Brother
summary_text: When "The Man" tries to derail a black candidate's presidential campaign, Undercover Brother and his fellow secret agents come to the rescue.

name: Peggy Sue Got Married
summary_text: Peggy Sue faints at a high school reunion. When she wakes up, she finds herself in her own past, just before she finished school.

name: Snatched
summary_text: When her boyfriend dumps her before their exotic vacation, a young woman persuades her ultra-cautious mother to travel with her to paradise, with unexpected results.

name: [REC] 3: Genesis
summary_text: A couple's wedding day turns horrific as some of the guests start showing signs of a strange illness.

name: Replicas
summary_text: A scientist becomes obsessed with bringing back his family members who died in a traffic accident.

name: The Air I Breathe
summary_text: A drama based on an ancient Chinese proverb that breaks life down into four emotional cornerstones: happiness, pleasure, sorrow and love. A businessman bets his life on a horse race; a gangster sees the future; a pop star falls prey to a crime boss; a doctor must save the love of his life.

name: May
summary_text: A socially awkward veterinary assistant with a lazy eye and obsession with perfection descends into depravity after developing a crush on a boy with perfect hands.

name: Suspicion
summary_text: A shy young heiress marries a charming gentleman, and soon begins to suspect he is planning to murder her.

name: Dnevnoy dozor
summary_text: A man who serves in the war between the forces of Light and Dark comes into possession of a device that can restore life to Moscow, which was nearly destroyed by an apocalyptic event.

name: Lionheart
summary_text: An Ex-French Soldier begins participating in underground street fights in order to make money for his brother's family.

name: In the Land of Blood and Honey
summary_text: During the Bosnian War, Danijel, a soldier fighting for the Serbs, re-encounters Ajla, a Bosnian who's now a captive in his camp he oversees. Their once promising connection has become ambiguous as their motives have changed.

name: Mother's Day
summary_text: Three generations come together in the week leading up to Mother's Day.

name: Admission
summary_text: A Princeton admissions officer who is up for a major promotion takes a professional risk after she meets a college-bound alternative school kid who just might be the son she gave up years ago in a secret adoption.

name: The Big Chill
summary_text: A group of seven former college friends gather for a week-end reunion at a South Carolina vacation home after the funeral of another of their college friends.

name: Rebecca
summary_text: A young newlywed arrives at her husband's imposing family estate on a windswept English coast and finds herself battling the shadow of his first wife, Rebecca, whose legacy lives on in the house long after her death.

name: Redirected
summary_text: Three friends try to make money and invite another friend in on a plot.

name: Spice World
summary_text: World famous pop group the Spice Girls zip around London in their luxurious double decker tour bus having various adventures and performing for their fans.

name: Out of the Past
summary_text: A private eye escapes his past to run a gas station in a small town, but his past catches up with him. Now he must return to the big city world of danger, corruption, double crosses and duplicitous dames.

name: Drumline
summary_text: A band director recruits a Harlem street drummer to play at a Southern university.

name: A Rainy Day in New York
summary_text: A young couple arrives in New York for a weekend where they are met with bad weather and a series of adventures.

name: Keeping Mum
summary_text: A pastor preoccupied with writing the perfect sermon fails to realize that his wife is having an affair, and his children are up to no good.

name: Smoke
summary_text: A Brooklyn smoke shop is the center of neighborhood activity, and the stories of its customers.

name: Bug
summary_text: An unhinged war veteran holes up with a lonely woman in a spooky Oklahoma motel room. The line between reality and delusion is blurred as they discover a bug infestation.

name: Confidence
summary_text: Jake Vig is a consummate grifter about to pull his biggest con yet, one set to avenge his friend's murder. But his last scam backfired, leaving him indebted to a mob boss and his enforcer.

name: Friday the 13th Part VII: The New Blood
summary_text: Years after Tommy Jarvis chained him underwater at Camp Crystal Lake, the dormant Jason Voorhees is accidentally released from his prison by a telekinetic teenager. Now, only she can stop him.

name: Now Is Good
summary_text: A teenage girl dying of leukemia compiles a list of things she would like to do before passing away. Topping the list is her desire to lose her virginity.

name: The Muppet Movie
summary_text: Kermit and his newfound friends trek across America to find success in Hollywood, but a frog legs merchant is after Kermit.

name: Agent Cody Banks
summary_text: A government agent trains Cody Banks in the ways of covert operations that require younger participants.
